title: Natural History Museum: Latest updates on crash - BBC News
summary: police say one man has been detained .
a car hit people on exhibition road in south kensington .
nine people were taken to hospital and two more were treated by paramedics .

documents.title: 'investigation ongoing '
text: the metropolitan police have released a statement confirming that a `` road traffic investigation '' is under way .
the force said the injuries sustained to the 11 people were `` not believed to be life-threatening or life-changing '' .
the detained man is under arrest , the police said , and is in custody at a north london police station .

documents.title: restaurants deserted
text: we 've been to the south end of exhibition road nearest the tube and the area , normally a busy destination for saturday afternoon dining by locals and tourists , is deserted .
eyewitnesses told us that police came rushing into each bar and restaurant and told people to get out .
we can see coats on chairs - some knocked over - half-eaten meals and half drunk glasses of wine .
police helped one restaurant owner to recover staff belongings , like house keys , because its unclear when the area will reopen .
author: Dominic Casciani
Home Affairs Correspondent

documents.title: 'i heard a couple of loud bangs '
text: eyewitness ellie mackay , who lives opposite south kensington tube station , said she heard `` a couple of loud bangs '' after a car hit people near the natural history museum .
she described the speed of the emergency services ' response as `` amazing '' .

documents.title: forensic officers gather evidence
text: forensic officers are at the scene - which has been cordoned off - gathering photographic evidence .

documents.title: map shows where south kensington crash happened
text: map shows where south kensington crash happened

documents.title: people 'reassuring families '
text: journalist tim stokes is at the scene :
`` on a normal saturday this area is packed with tourists but this afternoon the road is empty except for dozens of police vehicles and officers .
`` behind them , two officers stand holding guns while a police helicopter circles overhead .
`` onlookers wait with tv reporters , uncertain about what has happened .
`` an irish couple who have travelled to london for the day speak to their family on their phones , reassuring them everything is fine . ''

documents.title: 'screaming ' and 'confusion '
text: connor honeyman , who was in the queue for the museum , said he heard a `` horrible thudding noise '' before people started screaming and running inside .
he said : `` we ran in , everyone was following us , and then all the security guards ran out and they closed the main entrance .
`` there was much confusion before the police got there . ''

documents.title: 'people were screaming '
text: damien hackett was on his way to the natural history museum and witnessed the aftermath of the incident .
he said : `` everyone was instructed to get out of there now ''

documents.title: museum evacuation
text: this was the scene a short time ago outside the v & a museum , which is close to the scene of the crash .

documents.title: police awaiting further information
text: the met police has not indicated any more details about the nature of the incident , saying they will make another statement only when they have `` accurate '' information .

documents.title: science museum still open
text: the neighbouring science museum is open but , on advice from the metropolitan police , additional visitors are not being admitted .
science museum
sciencemuseum
the museum remains open but on the advice of the police we are not allowing additional visitors to enter at this time .
there has been a serious incident on exhibition road , not far from the museum .
we will share an update shortly .
the museum remains open but on the advice of the police we are not allowing additional visitors to enter at this time .

documents.title: 'i thought it was gunfire '
text: an eyewitness said : `` we were walking near the science museum and heard a bang , bang at first i thought it was gunfire .
`` then we walked past the scene of the accident and saw a guy pinned down by other men and lots of people calling the police .
`` there did n't appear to be many people hurt - a few sat by the side of the road but more looking shaken than anything . ''

documents.title: man pinned to floor outside museum
text: witnesses filmed police pinning a man to the ground near the museum .

documents.title: image of crashed car
text: this is the car that crashed on exhibition road , near the natural history museum .

documents.title: injured woman treated
text: a bbc reporter at the scene said police told her the pedestrians hit by the car sustained minor injuries .

documents.title: heavy police presence
text: armed police officers are at the scene in south kensington .

documents.title: 'run and do n't stop running '
text: a man who was at the scene in the minutes after the crash described seeing tables being knocked over and people screaming .
he said : `` police were adamant everyone was gone from that area immediately .
`` one policeman shouted 'run and do n't stop running ' . ''

documents.title: natural history museum evacuated
text: the bbc 's richard lister , who is at the scene , says the natural history museum has been evacuated and closed , and that other museums in the area have also been evacuated .
south kensington underground station is closed , he added , but other tube stations in the area remain open .

documents.title: images from the scene
text: photographs are beginning to come through of the police presence in exhibition road and the surrounding area .

documents.title: downing street statement
text: downing street says prime minister theresa may is being kept up to date on events .

documents.title: watch : 'the car looked like it had hit a boulder '
text: reporter chloe hayward describes what she saw at the scene after the incident .

documents.title: london ambulance at the scene
text: we are also responding to this incident .
more information will follow when we have it .
thankyou for being there .

documents.title: 'thought we heard gunshots ' - witness
text: a witness , who did not want to be named , said : `` we heard what i thought was gunshots and saw a car drive over the pavement .
`` we just ran .
my friend dived on the floor and cut her hands . ''

documents.title: police close roads
text: police closed exhibition road after the incident , which took place at 2.20pm .

documents.title: people injured in crash near london museum
text: a car has been involved in a collision near the natural history museum leaving a `` number '' of pedestrians injured .
the metropolitan police said one person had been detained following the incident in exhibition road , south kensington .
it added the man was with officers but had not been formally arrested .
inquiries are under way to establish the circumstances of the crash .
we 'll keep you informed here with the latest updates .
